com.venmo.touch.controller
Class VTNewCardViewController

java.lang.Object
  com.venmo.touch.controller.VTNewCardViewController

public class VTNewCardViewController
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for use with VTNewCardView.

Unlike VTSavedCardViewController, adding a card doesn't involve much direct interaction with Venmo Touch servers: new cards should be vaulted through your merchant gateway via a VTNewCardViewController.Listener.

When "Save to Venmo Touch" is checked, the controller consults the client for an encrypted session token, which must then be sent with the vault request.
